text: The battlefield is littered with the corpses of your enemies. Though they fought valiantly, there is no greater force than the inevitability of death. They might have been blind to this fact in life, but perhaps a new perspective can be gained in service to your legions.\\n\\nOne of your necromancers climbs to the top of a hill at the center of the battlefield, raises his hands, and gives new life to the slain.
Rite of the Endless Legions Unlocked
Congratulations, you have defeated Nagash! You became the Supreme Lord of Undeath and absorbed some of his powers.
